page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN DAVENTRY
page.content: AYRSHIRE METAL PRODUCTS On Wednesday 19th June 1985, Michael Forgione, Stewart Manning, Lee French and myself ( Gurjinder Bassan) went to Ayrshire Metal Products to ask Peter Ramsdon some questions about the factory. We were going in Mr Osborns car. When we got there , we went in the main entrance door . Then we waited for Peter Ramsdon, but he could not come so Mr Sergeant showed us around. When he showed us around we saw a machine which rolled out the metal sheets and gradually bent the metal into sort of corrugated metal sheets, which you canuse for roofs and some for the walls. Mr Ramsdon talked to us about what materials the metal was made of and the coating, plus the colours you can have. We also saw a shed made ofmetal they produced and we saw a lady who was driving a truck to Holland.
